Package org.optim4j.ns

Class AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores

java.lang.Object
org.optim4j.ns.AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores
Enclosing class:
AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>
public static class AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores extends Object
An encapsulation of all types of scores for repairers and destroyers.

    • Scores

      public Scores​(double initialScore, double scoreIncrementWhenNeighborBetterThanBest, double scoreIncrementWhenNeighborBetterThanCurrent, double scoreIncrementWhenNeighborAcceptable, double scoreDecrementWhenNeighborNotAcceptable)
      Initializes the instance with provided values.
      Parameters:
      initialScore - initial score
      scoreIncrementWhenNeighborBetterThanBest - score when neighbor is better than best agent
      scoreIncrementWhenNeighborBetterThanCurrent - score when neighbor is better than current agent
      scoreIncrementWhenNeighborAcceptable - score when neighbor is not better than either current or best agent but is still acceptable according to acceptance criteria
